states.heading: Mission
states.text: Empower users to organize their ideas, tasks, and goals through a clean, intuitive, and distraction-free experience that boosts daily productivity.

states.heading: Vision
states.text: Become a reference tool for individuals who value simplicity, efficiency, and a touch of creativity when managing their personal or professional tasks.

states.heading: Values
states.text: A clear and accessible interface for everyone. With tools that help users save time and stay focused. Implements features like the task roulette that make productivity engaging. So far a stable, secure, and consistent experience.
